name: test_e2e_with_logs[221_CMD_ENV_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_003` |
| **Name** | IFS manipulation |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `IFS=,;cat,/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `IFS%3D%2C%3Bcat%2C%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes
